analyzed: theg pa chen po la mos pa'i rigs kyi bu la la dag ni /
translated: Some sons of good family who aspire to the Great Vehicle,

original: dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyan ras gzigs spyod pa de la gzhan spyod par 'dod na bslab pa'i thabs ci ltar bslab ces dris pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyan ras gzigs spyod pa de la gzhan spyod par 'dod na bslab pa'i thabs ci ltar bslab ces dris pa'o //
translated: If they wish to practice that practice of Avalokitêśvara in the profound meaning of the non-apprehending perfection of wisdom, how should they train in the method of training?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa ni zhus pa'i lan bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa ni zhus pa'i lan bstan pa'o //
translated: The statement The bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra is the teaching of the reply to the question.

original: sh'a ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des /
translated: Śāriputra, any son or daughter of good family who wishes to practice the profound perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di ltar bslab par bya ste zhes pa ni gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bslab par bya ste zhes pa ni gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa ste /
translated: should train in this way. This is the acceptance of speaking.

original: theg pa chen po la mos par rigs /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la mos par rigs /
translated: It is the lineage of aspiration for the Mahāyāna.

original: pho 'am mo 'am gang la la dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab la da spyod ba'i don la khyed spyod par 'dod na 'di ltar slobs zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: pho 'am mo 'am gang la la dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab la da spyod ba'i don la khyed spyod par 'dod na 'di ltar slobs zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means If you, a man or woman, wish to practice the meaning of the practice of non-apprehending wisdom, train in this way.

original: phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par rjes su blta'o zhes pa ni thun mong gi phung po lnga la sogs pa de rnams ni ye nas stong pa yin pas /
analyzed: phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par rjes su blta'o zhes pa ni thun mong gi phung po lnga la sogs pa de rnams ni ye nas stong pa yin pas /
translated: The five aggregates and so forth are primordially empty, so

original: de dag khyed kyis kyang rang bzhin gyis stong bar rnam par nga'i rjes su ltos shig / de rnams la mos pa'i don gyis ba'o //
analyzed: de dag khyed kyis kyang rang bzhin gyis stong bar rnam par nga'i rjes su ltos shig / de rnams la mos pa'i don gyis ba'o //
translated: you should also see them as empty of intrinsic nature, following my example.🔽The meaning of the term “resolve” is that.

original: gzugs stong pa'o zhes pa ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa'o zhes pa ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Form is empty means that the essence of form is empty by nature.

original: stong pa nyid gzugs so zhes pa ni stong pa nyid don rig pa ma 'gags pas gzugs ltar snang ba'o //🔽gzugs stong ba nyid las gzhan ma yin no zhes pa ni gzugs stong pa de las 'khor 'das kyi chos gzhan snang ba ma yin zhes @208a * //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs so zhes pa ni stong pa nyid don rig pa ma 'gags pas gzugs ltar snang ba'o // gzugs stong ba nyid las gzhan ma yin no zhes pa ni gzugs stong pa de las 'khor 'das kyi chos gzhan snang ba ma yin zhes @208a * //
translated: Emptiness is form means that since the meaning of emptiness is unimpeded awareness, it appears as if it were form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness means that apart from that empty form, no other phenomena of samsara or nirvana appear.

original: pa ni ; stong ba'i yon tan ma 'gags pa de las gzhan gzugs snang ba gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: pa ni ; stong ba'i yon tan ma 'gags pa de las gzhan gzugs snang ba gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Apart from emptiness, no form appears.

original: gzugs de bzhin du gnas pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs de bzhin du gnas pa de bzhin du /
translated: Form abides in that way.

original: de la gnas ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams ni gzugs bzhin du gnas pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la gnas ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams ni gzugs bzhin du gnas pa'i don to //
translated: Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness abide in that way.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de zhes pa ni /
translated: Śāriputra, therefore, all phenomena are emptiness.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'khor ba'i dngos po gzugs la sogs pa dngos po med bar stong pa nyid du de lta bas na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'khor ba'i dngos po gzugs la sogs pa dngos po med bar stong pa nyid du de lta bas na /
translated: Śāriputra, the things of saṃsāra, such as form, are empty, without things.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid do //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, all phenomena of nirvāṇa are emptiness by nature.

original: stong pa nyid don stong pa nyid kyi don rang ni 'di lta bu ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid don stong pa nyid kyi don rang ni 'di lta bu ste /
translated: The meaning of emptiness is the meaning of emptiness.

original: gzugs sam stong pa'i mtshan nyid gang yang med pa rgyu rkyen gang gis kyang ma bskyed pa rang gi ngo bo'i yon tan gang du yang ma 'gags pa /
analyzed: gzugs sam stong pa'i mtshan nyid gang yang med pa rgyu rkyen gang gis kyang ma bskyed pa rang gi ngo bo'i yon tan gang du yang ma 'gags pa /
translated: There is no characteristic of form or emptiness at all. It is not produced by any cause or condition. Its own essence is not stopped in any way.

original: dngos po'i dri ma gang yang med ba /
analyzed: dngos po'i dri ma gang yang med ba /
translated: It has no stain of any thing at all.

original: de yang ye thog ma nas gzung 'dzin gyi phyogs gang du yang ma lhung bas /
analyzed: de yang ye thog ma nas gzung 'dzin gyi phyogs gang du yang ma lhung bas /
translated: Furthermore, since it never falls into any extreme of percept or perceiver from the very beginning,

original: dri ma dang bral ba yang med /
analyzed: dri ma dang bral ba yang med /
translated: it is also not free from taints.

original: snying po'i don de rkyen gyis bri ba med pa /
analyzed: snying po'i don de rkyen gyis bri ba med pa /
translated: The meaning of the core is not diminished by conditions.

original: rgyu gzhan lta gcig gis bskyed nas yon tan gyis gang ba'i rgyu yang med do //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan lta gcig gis bskyed nas yon tan gyis gang ba'i rgyu yang med do //
translated: It is not a cause that is filled with qualities generated by another cause.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na zhes pas ni dmigs par bya ba'i stong pa de nyid las /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na zhes pas ni dmigs par bya ba'i stong pa de nyid las /
translated: Śāriputra, therefore, the emptiness that is to be observed

original: nyams su blang ba'i rgyu dang dngos bo grub pa med de /
analyzed: nyams su blang ba'i rgyu dang dngos bo grub pa med de /
translated: has no cause or entity to practice.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because form is emptiness,

original: tshor ba la sogs pa yang gnyis su med la /
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa yang gnyis su med la /
translated: feelings and so on are also nondual.

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo lnga dang / de la las lnga la sogs pa dang / chos lnga yang gang yang dmigs su yang med do //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo lnga dang / de la las lnga la sogs pa dang / chos lnga yang gang yang dmigs su yang med do //
translated: The five sense gates of the eyes and so on, the five objects, and so on, and the five dharmas are also not observed at all.

original: de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa'i khams kyang dbyer mi phyid pa'o ;
analyzed: de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa'i khams kyang dbyer mi phyid pa'o ;
translated: The elements of the eyes and so on are also not divisible.

original: / de ltar na snying po'i don de la ma rig pa yang med de /
analyzed: / de ltar na snying po'i don de la ma rig pa yang med de /
translated: As such, ignorance also does not exist in the meaning of the core.

original: de zad pa'i rgyu yang med do //
analyzed: de zad pa'i rgyu yang med do //
translated: There is also no cause for their exhaustion.

original: stong ba'i don de nyid la rgas pa dang shi ba yang med de /
analyzed: stong ba'i don de nyid la rgas pa dang shi ba yang med de /
translated: In the meaning of emptiness, there is also no aging or death.

original: de ltar skye rga na 'chi rten 'brel la zad pa yang med do //
analyzed: de ltar skye rga na 'chi rten 'brel la zad pa yang med do //
translated: In that way, there is no exhaustion of the dependent origination of birth, aging, sickness, and death.

original: de ltar don de nyid la sdug bsngal te dug lnga las grub pa yang med la /
analyzed: de ltar don de nyid la sdug bsngal te dug lnga las grub pa yang med la /
translated: In that meaning, there is also no suffering, which is produced from the five poisons.

original: de las byung ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med de /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med de /
translated: There is no all-­pervading affliction that arises from that.

original: de'i don gyis sdug bsngal ba bde bar 'gog pa yang med la /
analyzed: de'i don gyis sdug bsngal ba bde bar 'gog pa yang med la /
translated: In that meaning, there is also no cessation of happiness as suffering.

original: de'i don gyis 'khor ba'i dngos po nyams su blang ba med pa na /
analyzed: de'i don gyis 'khor ba'i dngos po nyams su blang ba med pa na /
translated: Since there is no experience of the entity of samsara in that meaning,

original: mya ngan las 'das bar byed pa'i lam la yang thob pa'i rgyu med de /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das bar byed pa'i lam la yang thob pa'i rgyu med de /
translated: there is also no cause for attaining the path that creates nirvana.

original: lam dang sa rnams kyang sbyang zhing bgrod du med do //🔽@208b thun mong gi ye shes lnga la sogs pa yang med don snying po'i don de las gzhan nas thob ba yang med la /
analyzed: lam dang sa rnams kyang sbyang zhing bgrod du med do // @208b thun mong gi ye shes lnga la sogs pa yang med don snying po'i don de las gzhan nas thob ba yang med la /
translated: The paths and stages are also not purified or traversed.🔽The five common pristine consciousnesses and so on are also nonexistent.🔽Since the meaning of the essence is primordially present as one’s

original: rang gi dngos po'i don ye nas rang chas su yod pas /
analyzed: rang gi dngos po'i don ye nas rang chas su yod pas /
translated: entity, there is also nothing to attain from elsewhere.

original: mthob pa'i rgyu yang med do //
analyzed: mthob pa'i rgyu yang med do //
translated: There is also no cause for attainment.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na /
translated: Śāriputra, for that reason,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thob pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thob pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: because there is no attainment for bodhisattvas,🔽they rely on and abide in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te zhes pa ni sh'a ri'i bu lam la gzhan nas thob ba'i rgyu med pa de lta bas na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te zhes pa ni sh'a ri'i bu lam la gzhan nas thob ba'i rgyu med pa de lta bas na /
translated: Śāriputra, because there is no cause for attainment elsewhere on the path,

original: 'bras bu gzhan nas thob pa med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan nas thob pa med pa'i phyir na /
translated: there is no attainment of a result elsewhere.🔽Since there is no reference point,

original: dmigs pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
translated: in the perfection of wisdom,

original: snying po'i chos kun la zhes bya ste /
analyzed: snying po'i chos kun la zhes bya ste /
translated: all the essential dharmas

original: 'bras bu de kha la brten cing gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu de kha la brten cing gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be the result that is relied upon and abides.

original: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag ba med de phyin ci log las shin tu 'das te mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i don rang chas su gnas pas de las gzhan med pas sems la sgrib pa'i chos med la /
analyzed: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag ba med de phyin ci log las shin tu 'das te mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i don rang chas su gnas pas de las gzhan med pas sems la sgrib pa'i chos med la /
translated: Since the meaning of the result abides as a natural attribute, there is nothing other than that. Therefore, there are no phenomena that obscure the mind.

original: gzhan nas mthob kyis dogs pa'i skrag pa yang med de /
analyzed: gzhan nas mthob kyis dogs pa'i skrag pa yang med de /
translated: There is no fear of not obtaining it elsewhere.

original: log pa'i shes pa rnams las shin tu 'das te /
analyzed: log pa'i shes pa rnams las shin tu 'das te /
translated: It is utterly beyond all wrong understandings.

original: 'khor ba'i dmigs pa'i shes pa med par mya ngan las 'das te /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dmigs pa'i shes pa med par mya ngan las 'das te /
translated: It is nirvana, in which the consciousness that perceives samsara does not exist.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa la mthar phyin to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa la mthar phyin to //
translated: It is the perfection of the stage of buddhahood.🔽All the buddhas who dwell in the three times have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment by relying on the perfection of wisdom.

original: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes pa ni de ltar na 'bras bu'i rgyu
analyzed: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes pa ni de ltar na 'bras bu'i rgyu
translated: This is the cause of the result.

original: gcig la bzhag nas thob pa'i rgyu med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig la bzhag nas thob pa'i rgyu med pa ma yin te /
translated: Having been placed in this way, it is not that there is no cause for attainment.

original: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang dmigs pa med pa'i don la brten nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa las log pa'i don med de /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang dmigs pa med pa'i don la brten nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa las log pa'i don med de /
translated: The buddhas of the past, present, and future have attained the unsurpassed state of all buddhas by relying on the meaning of the absence of reference points.

original: yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa /
analyzed: yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa /
translated: The meaning of the absence of reference points is the perfect teaching and so forth.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams byang ba /
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams byang ba /
translated: The obscurations to knowledge are purified.

original: snying po'i don la chub pa rang gzhan gyi don /
analyzed: snying po'i don la chub pa rang gzhan gyi don /
translated: The meaning of the essence is realized, the benefit of self and other.

original: rang la rang chas su mngon bar yon tan thams cad rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rang la rang chas su mngon bar yon tan thams cad rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: All qualities are perfected in oneself, and one is a buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so zhes pa ni de lta bur dmigs pa'i yul dang / nyams su blang ba'i thabs dang / mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu rnams gzhan nas 'byung ba ma thob pa'i rgyu med pas na de'i don ni shes pa'i rab @209a * //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so zhes pa ni de lta bur dmigs pa'i yul dang / nyams su blang ba'i thabs dang / mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu rnams gzhan nas 'byung ba ma thob pa'i rgyu med pas na de'i don ni shes pa'i rab @209a * //
translated: Shariputra, therefore, the mantra of the perfection of wisdom is thus. Since the object of such observation, the method of practice, and the ultimate result do not arise from elsewhere, the meaning of that is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of the other shore of samsara.

original: de'i don ni sngags zhes bya ba ni yon tan lnga dang ldan ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni sngags zhes bya ba ni yon tan lnga dang ldan ba'o //
translated: The meaning of that is called mantra, endowed with five qualities.

original: gzhan gyi don la rag ma lus rang nyid la gnas pas sngags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don la rag ma lus rang nyid la gnas pas sngags zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it does not depend on the benefit of others, it is called mantra.

original: de'i yon tan yang rang nyid kyis rang rig pas rig pa chen mo'i sngags la /
analyzed: de'i yon tan yang rang nyid kyis rang rig pas rig pa chen mo'i sngags la /
translated: The qualities of that are also known by oneself, the great knowledge mantra.

original: gzhan la bzlas su med pas bla na med pa la dngos por grub pa med pas mtshan ma dang mi mnyam pa /
analyzed: gzhan la bzlas su med pas bla na med pa la dngos por grub pa med pas mtshan ma dang mi mnyam pa /
translated: Since it cannot be repeated to others, it is unsurpassed. Since it is not established as a thing, it is without signs.

original: mtshan ma nyid de'i yon tan yin pas na /
analyzed: mtshan ma nyid de'i yon tan yin pas na /
translated: Since the sign itself is its quality,

original: dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po'i don du mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po'i don du mnyam pa'o //
translated: it is equal in the meaning of the indivisible essence.

original: snying po'i don de rtogs nas log pa'i sdug bsngal rnams rab tu mchog tu zhi bar byed de /
analyzed: snying po'i don de rtogs nas log pa'i sdug bsngal rnams rab tu mchog tu zhi bar byed de /
translated: Having realized that meaning of the essence, the sufferings of error are completely pacified.🔽The meaning of the mantra that abides in the state without reference is not false.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'i sngags de'i don mi brdzun te snying po'i don du bden par shes te /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'i sngags de'i don mi brdzun te snying po'i don du bden par shes te /
translated: The meaning of the essence is known to be true.

original: de'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sngags spyan ras gzigs kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sngags spyan ras gzigs kyis smras pa /
translated: Therefore, the mantra of all perfection of wisdom was spoken by Avalokiteśvara.

original: tad++ya th'a / zhes pa ni /
analyzed: tad++ya th'a / zhes pa ni /
translated: Tadyathā means

original: 'khor 'das kyi don snying por gcig pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'khor 'das kyi don snying por gcig pa 'di lta ste /
translated: the meaning of samsara and nirvana is the same in the essence.

original: zhes pa'i don to //🔽de yang dmigs pa med par gcig pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'i don to // de yang dmigs pa med par gcig pa /
translated: This is the meaning of that.🔽Furthermore, it is the same without reference.

original: 'byed pa med par gcig pa /
analyzed: 'byed pa med par gcig pa /
translated: It is the same without division.

original: rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i don 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i don 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of the unchanging nature is as follows.

original: aom ni 'khor ba'i dus su dag lnga ltar du snang ba 'bras bu'i dus su rigs lnga yab lnga ltar snang ba de ni log pa'i shes pa la snang gi de nyid la dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni 'khor ba'i dus su dag lnga ltar du snang ba 'bras bu'i dus su rigs lnga yab lnga ltar snang ba de ni log pa'i shes pa la snang gi de nyid la dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: Om is the appearance of the five pure aspects in the time of cyclic existence, appearing as the five fathers of the five families in the time of the result. That appears to mistaken consciousness, but it is not an object of observation for that.

original: shes rab gzhan mi gnas par rtogs pa /
analyzed: shes rab gzhan mi gnas par rtogs pa /
translated: Wisdom is the realization of nonabiding.

original: 'bras bu'i pha rol tu ga te ni bdag don du phyin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i pha rol tu ga te ni bdag don du phyin la /
translated: Paramita means “gone to the other side” for the sake of oneself.

original: gzhan don du yang ga te sa phyin pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan don du yang ga te sa phyin pa'i don to //
translated: It also means “gone to the other side” for the sake of others.

original: p'a ra ga te ni bdag don gyi mchog tu phyin te gzhan la re ba'i yul med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: p'a ra ga te ni bdag don gyi mchog tu phyin te gzhan la re ba'i yul med do zhes pa'o //
translated: Pâramitâ means “gone to the supreme other side” for the sake of oneself, meaning that there is no object of hope for others.

original: p'a ra sangga te ni gzhan don gyi mchog gam phul du phyin te /🔽gdul bya dmigs pa'i thugs rje 'byung ba yang /🔽gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba sprul sku rang bzhin dag pa la snang ba longs sku /
analyzed: p'a ra sangga te ni gzhan don gyi mchog gam phul du phyin te / gdul bya dmigs pa'i thugs rje 'byung ba yang / gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba sprul sku rang bzhin dag pa la snang ba longs sku /
translated: Pâramitâ means “gone to the supreme or best other side” for the sake of others.🔽The arising of compassion that observes disciples is the nirmâṇakâya, appearing to pure disciples.

original: bo dhi rgyun mi 'chad pa thug rje /
analyzed: bo dhi rgyun mi 'chad pa thug rje /
translated: The arising of compassion that is uninterrupted is the sambhogakâya, appearing to the pure nature.

original: gdul bya la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gdul bya la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du 'byung ngo //
translated: Compassion arises for disciples in the sense of the perfection of wisdom.
